about_the_game:
WARNING: Violet Muscle Pain contains flashing images. If you experience epileptic seizures or blackouts, immediately stop playing Violet Muscle Pain and consult your doctor before resuming.

In 9099, humans have colonized and inhabited every planet in the Solar System. Over time, populations on these planets have increased due to a mysterious aerosphere, creating faster birth rates and longer lifespans among it's inhabitants. Above each planet is an invisible military complex created by each planet's government. All military complexes are collectively financed by a cryptocracy called PAM (Planet Alliance Ministry).

PAM controls the social, political, and economic landscape of the Solar System. Over time, a manufactured religion conceived by PAM has been socially engineering humans to believe and justify population control. To control populations on each planet, PAM has the military construct and use mechs that fire nuclear missiles on targeted areas. Humans call them Angelics created by who they call God. You are a pilot from the military employed by PAM to use these mechs.

In this score attack mini game, match the large number with the small number within the time limit. Time is extremely limited, so aim and shoot efficiently. Good luck pilot!

Features Include:

- Endless Gameplay: On the job forever! Is there no end to this massacre?

- High Score System: Your best score is saved and ranked on the Steam Leaderboards.

- Title System: The higher you score, the better your title! There are 7 titles total.

name: Violet Muscle Pain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX0708
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse recommended

short_description: You are employed by PAM (Planet Alliance Ministry) to pilot a mech that is used for population control. Land on the designated site, locate the densely populated areas, and destroy them. This will not be easy. Thank you for your dedicated service.
